root.name: Star Wars: Galaxies - Trials of Obi-Wan
root.description: SummaryÂ Released as a digital download November 1 2005, Star Wars: Galaxies - Trials of Obi-Wan is the third expansion for the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. The expansion adds the planet of Mustafar, which is seen at the end of Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith. Players were given the ability to take missions and quests from the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi himself. It introduced over 50 quests that include many high end quest rewards. As a pre-order offer, players were given special items if they had pre-ordered the game before October 25th. These include: an 8 player transport vehicle, a lava flea mount and an underground bunker.
